'''1.21.9 Pre-Release 4''' (known as '''1.21.9-pre4''' in the launcher) is the fourth and final [[pre-release]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.9]], released on September 23, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-9-pre-release-4|Minecraft 1.21.9 Pre-Release 4|September 23, 2025}}</ref>

== Changes ==
'''[[Debug menu]]'''
* The debug options screen is now accessible using {{key|F3+F6}} instead of {{key|F3+F5}}.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.9-pre4
|;dev
|300216|The new F3 + F5 debug settings menu does not open on Mac keyboards.
|301735|Server Management Protocol Kick command parameter mis match.
|302039|Conduits don't have the block-breaking animation.
|302119|Shield with patterns has no enchantment glint when enchanted.
|302130|Mobs have visual glitches all over them.
|302170|Player Heads do not Glow.
|302240|Bugs on ranged weapons.
}}</onlyinclude>
